alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 01 at 9:04PM MST until February 02 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. A brief period of intense snow and gusty easterly winds will develop late this evening. * WHERE...Bitterroot/Sapphire Mountains. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
